author: Justin Wise
title: Pelosi: 'Really unfortunate' that protesters are pushing back against coronavirus restrictions
description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) on Sunday spoke out against demonstrators who are gathering in some states to protest stringent stay-at-home orders designed to limit the spread of the novel coronavirus.Speaking on...
